justification: Prevent reverse traffic from data tier to web tier - data exfiltration protection
Allow HTTP traffic to web tier - legitimate public access
Allow HTTPS traffic to web tier - legitimate public access
Allow web tier to communicate with application tier
Allow app tier to access Redis cache
Allow app tier to access message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ)
Allow management tier to collect metrics from all tiers
Block SSH access from external networks - high security risk
Block RDP access from external networks - high security risk
Block Telnet access from external networks - high security risk
Block direct MySQL access from external - data exfiltration risk
Block direct PostgreSQL access from external - data exfiltration risk
Block direct MongoDB access from external - data exfiltration risk
Block direct Redis access from external - data exfiltration risk
Allow app tier to access MySQL databases
Allow app tier to access PostgreSQL databases
Allow app tier to access MongoDB databases
Default deny policy for zero-trust architecture
